name: Brookover Farm Bed and Breakfast

reviews.text: We stayed here as a group of 4 divers (Vobster Quay is only a short drive away). The property is set in a lovely location in the countryside and is in fact an Equestrian centre as well. The rooms have been recenty decorated I think as everything is pristeen and also kept spotlessly clean. The rooms are very comfortable and spacious with full tea / coffee facilities and flatscreen tvs. The owners are very friendly and welcoming and had some good recommendations of places to eat in Frome. A full breakfast is provided to order. We only stayed one night but thoroughly enjoyed our stay and wouldn't hesitate to go back!
reviews.title: Lovely spot, very friendly and comfortable

aka: Brookover Farm Bed And Breakfast Frome, England
